dialogSpare.title: List of Spare Numbers
dialogSpare.headline: Spare Numbers of
dialogSpare.noNumberSelected: You didn't select any number. You need to select at least one number by clicking on a number in the list.

numbers.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the selected numbers from your account?
numbers.successDelete: You successfuly deleted {{count}} phone number(s) from your account(s)
numbers.successMove: You successfuly moved {{count}} phone number(s) to the following account: {{ accountName }}
numbers.noSpareNumber: There are no spare number in this account.
numbers.noUsedNumber: There are no numbers used in any application for this account.
numbers.helpSpareNumbers: This shows the list of numbers not used anywhere in this account. You can assign those numbers to your sub-accounts or delete these numbers from your account.
numbers.helpUsedNumbers: This list displays where are used your numbers. You can also see the list of numbers used by your sub-accounts.
numbers.notUsedNumber: {{number}}: This number is not used but belongs to {{accountName}}. (Switch to Spare Numbers view to see this number)
numbers.notSpareNumber: {{number}}: This number is not a spare number but is used by {{accountName}}. (Switch to the Numbers in Use view to see this number)
numbers.numberNotFound: The number you searched was not found.
numbers.failoverIconHelp: This icon means that you set up a failover number for this phone number
numbers.cnamIconHelp: This icon means that you set up the Caller-ID for this phone number
numbers.e911IconHelp: This icon means that you set up e911 for this phone number
numbers.localIconHelp: This icon means that this number is a local number

delete.title: Delete Numbers - Confirmation
delete.questionPartOne: Are you sure you want to delete

callerId.errorUpdate: Failed to update the Caller ID for this phone number

help.firstLine: Whatever text you put here will show up on the Caller ID Name field.
help.secondLine: Please note Cellular devices do not display this field and it may take up to 72 hours to update.

callerId.label: Caller-ID
callerId.successCnam: You successfully updated the Caller-ID of {{phoneNumber}}
callerId.successRemoveCnam: You successfully removed the Caller-ID of {{phoneNumber}}
callerId.noCallerId: There is no Caller-ID for the phone number {{phoneNumber}}

e911.errorUpdate: Failed to update the E911 Settings for this phone number
e911.infoBox: This address will show up to 911 emergency services when you dial it from your number.
e911.label: e911
e911.lastE911Error: You must have e911 set up on at least one number in your account. Please set it up on another number before removing it from this one.
e911.successE911: You successfully updated the e911 address of {{phoneNumber}}
e911.title: E911 Address

failover.errorUpdate: Failed to update the Failover for this phone number.
failover.failoverText: When Inbound call is unreachable, place your call to
failover.helpFailover: If your phone system is unreachable for any reason, we can redirect a caller to an alternate phone number or VoIP device. If the Failover number is an external number this call will cost you for both inbound and outbound.
failover.invalidFailoverNumber: Invalid Failover Number, please type it again
failover.label: Failover
failover.noDataFailover: No data entered, please type it again
failover.successFailover: You successfully updated the failover number of {{ phoneNumber }}
failover.successRemove: You successfully removed the failover settings of {{ phoneNumber }}

buyNumbers.cityInputLabel: Search by City or Area Code
buyNumbers.seqNumAlert: You must specify how many sequential numbers you want in a row (any integer between 2 and 999).
buyNumbers.noInputAlert: You must enter an Area Code or a City name to continue!
buyNumbers.noSelectedNumAlert: You didn't select any number to buy.
buyNumbers.noSearchResult: Sorry, we could not find any number matching your request. Please try again with different parameters.
buyNumbers.partialNumAlert: Please enter a valid number. Partial numbers are not allowed.
buyNumbers.processingMessage2: Please wait until the process has been completed.
buyNumbers.unavailableMessage: Oops! These numbers just became unavailable. Continue with the remaining available numbers or go back to search results and add more numbers.
buyNumbers.unavailableServiceAlert: Service currently unavailable, sorry for the inconvenience. Please try again later.
buyNumbers.confirmInfoMsg1: Numbers will be added to your account and will be ready 15 minutes after the purchase.
buyNumbers.confirmInfoMsg2: Your on-file credit card will immediately be charged for recurring services. Charges will be pro-rated for your billing cycle.
buyNumbers.vanitySearchLabel: Search a Local or Tollfree Vanity Number:
buyNumbers.vanitySearchInfo1: You can search for any combination of numbers or letters.
buyNumbers.vanitySearchInfo2: If you can not find a specific number then feel free to send us a request. We can look through all the databases and see if we can get you the number you want. There would be a onetime $20 fee for requesting a special number.
buyNumbers.partialPurchaseFailure: Sorry, some of the requested numbers could not be purchased.

port.labelSaveButton: If you do not have all the required documents, save and come back later.
port.cancelOrderPopup: Are you sure you want to cancel this transfer?

addNumbers.title: We are excited you are moving numbers to our service!
addNumbers.labelAddNumbers: What numbers do you want to transfer? Type one number in at a time or paste all. No extra characters beside number.

port.invalidNumber: The number that you entered is invalid !!!
port.invalidNumbers: The numbers that you entered are invalid and were removed !!!

confirmOrder.labelEmail: Who should we notify upon completion?
confirmOrder.labelDate: When do you want to transfer the numbers?
confirmOrder.dateInfoPartTwo: We do not guarantee same date but we will try our best or inform you if any changes. Please note that ports can take from 3 to 30 days.
confirmOrder.labelTemporaryNumbers: Would you like to have temporary numbers?
confirmOrder.labelTemporaryNumbersCount: How many numbers would you like to buy?
confirmOrder.temporaryNumbersInfoPartOne: These numbers will automatically be added to your current application. You will be charged
confirmOrder.temporaryNumbersInfoPartTwo: 1/Month/Number. Delete these numbers once your existing number transfer get completed to avoid charges.
confirmOrder.orderTotalInfoPartTwo: 5/number will be charged to your account.

manageOrders.orderListInfo: Due to the nature of your numbers or the carriers, we may split your order. You will be able to process all the orders, one at a time.
manageOrders.eulaInfo: In the next step we need to collect the bill to show that you are the rightful owner of these numbers. This is required by law. We may split your order further if the numbers are not mentioned in the bill you will upload.
manageOrders.eulaWarningPartTwo: Please understand and agree with the following
manageOrders.labelCancelService: I will not cancel my old service until after the numbers are completely transfered,
manageOrders.labelCancelNumbers: I understand any other numbers on the old account may be cancelled by the old provider,
manageOrders.labelChangeFee: I understand my old carrier may charge an early termination fee,
manageOrders.labelStandardNumbers: These are standard phone numbers, not featured (like [star-ring]).

resumeOrder.title: Complete the following orders, one at a time!

submitDocuments.labelOrderName: Name that helps you remember this transfer
submitDocuments.labelOrderNameHelper: For eg. 2600hz office local DIDs, NY office numbers
submitDocuments.billInfoPartOne: Please submit your current phone bill and fill out account details as mentioned on the bill you upload.
submitDocuments.orderListInfoPartOne: Please verify that the following numbers are mentioned on the bill you upload.
submitDocuments.orderListInfoPartTwo: If the numbers are not mentioned on the bill, please REMOVE them or this order will fail to transfer all the numbers.
submitDocuments.loaTitlePartOne: Please fill out the Letter of Authorization (LoA)
submitDocuments.loaHelperPartOne: For those who donâ€™t have time, printer or scanner, we also offer digital sign for

alertLogout: Your session is about to expire. Move your cursor to resume activity.

chargeReminder.line1: Your on-file credit card will immediately be charged for any changes you make. If you have changed any recurring services, new charges will be pro-rated for your billing cycle.
chargeReminder.line2: Are you sure you want to continue?

errors.generic: An unknown error happened, please try again in a few seconds!
errors.401: Invalid credentials, please check that your username and account name are correct.
errors.500: Internal server error, please contact your administrator

unexpectedError: An unexpected error happened, please try again!
